trans-unit.source: Transforms/Maps Best Practices
trans-unit.target: Transforms/Maps Best Practices

trans-unit.source: Label and Comment Properties
trans-unit.target: Label and Comment Properties

trans-unit.source: When configuring a <token>mapop</token>, modify the <legacyBold>Label</legacyBold> property to name each <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: When configuring a <token>mapop</token>, modify the <legacyBold>Label</legacyBold> property to name each <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Populate the <legacyBold>Comment</legacyBold> property with specific details, especially the MapEach and ForEach <token>mapop</token>s:
trans-unit.target: Populate the <legacyBold>Comment</legacyBold> property with specific details, especially the MapEach and ForEach <token>mapop</token>s:

trans-unit.source: This <legacyBold>Label</legacyBold> name is used in the breadcrumb trail.
trans-unit.target: This <legacyBold>Label</legacyBold> name is used in the breadcrumb trail.

trans-unit.source: It is very important to change the <legacyBold>Label</legacyBold> name.
trans-unit.target: It is very important to change the <legacyBold>Label</legacyBold> name.

trans-unit.source: Also, the <legacyBold>Search</legacyBold> feature can be used to find a specific <token>mapop</token> by the <legacyBold>Label</legacyBold> name or text within the <legacyBold>Comment</legacyBold> property.
trans-unit.target: Also, the <legacyBold>Search</legacyBold> feature can be used to find a specific <token>mapop</token> by the <legacyBold>Label</legacyBold> name or text within the <legacyBold>Comment</legacyBold> property.

trans-unit.source: Breadcrumb Trail
trans-unit.target: Breadcrumb Trail

trans-unit.source: When creating links and adding <token>mapop</token>s, use the Breadcrumb trail to determine the current scope container.
trans-unit.target: When creating links and adding <token>mapop</token>s, use the Breadcrumb trail to determine the current scope container.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the <token>transform</token> Design surface, the scope hierarchy is displayed in the breadcrumb trail.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the <token>transform</token> Design surface, the scope hierarchy is displayed in the breadcrumb trail.

trans-unit.source: The current scope is the last item in the breadcrumb trail.
trans-unit.target: The current scope is the last item in the breadcrumb trail.

trans-unit.source: When a MapEach Loop scope is set, the breadcrumb trail is updated to reflect the current hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: When a MapEach Loop scope is set, the breadcrumb trail is updated to reflect the current hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: In the example below, the Employee Mapping MapEach Loop is the last item in the breadcrumb trail so it is the current set scope.
trans-unit.target: In the example below, the Employee Mapping MapEach Loop is the last item in the breadcrumb trail so it is the current set scope.

trans-unit.source: Any <token>mapop</token>s added or links created are under the Employee Mapping scope:
trans-unit.target: Any <token>mapop</token>s added or links created are under the Employee Mapping scope:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="4a57af82-cae8-412d-a066-fb6a766d0be1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working within the Scope</link> provides more specific details.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="4a57af82-cae8-412d-a066-fb6a766d0be1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working within the Scope</link> provides more specific details.

trans-unit.source: Sample Input File
trans-unit.target: Sample Input File

trans-unit.source: Before starting to create a <token>transform</token>, have a sample input.xml file ready to test the <token>transform</token>.
trans-unit.target: Before starting to create a <token>transform</token>, have a sample input.xml file ready to test the <token>transform</token>.

trans-unit.source: Build in Increments
trans-unit.target: Build in Increments

trans-unit.source: Build the <token>transform</token> incrementally.
trans-unit.target: Build the <token>transform</token> incrementally.

trans-unit.source: Once portions of the <token>transform</token> are built, save it and fix any errors.
trans-unit.target: Once portions of the <token>transform</token> are built, save it and fix any errors.

trans-unit.source: Test the <token>transform</token> using the <legacyBold>Test Map</legacyBold> feature.
trans-unit.target: Test the <token>transform</token> using the <legacyBold>Test Map</legacyBold> feature.

trans-unit.source: Set Scope
trans-unit.target: Set Scope

trans-unit.source: Set the correct working scope container when creating a <token>transform</token>.
trans-unit.target: Set the correct working scope container when creating a <token>transform</token>.

trans-unit.source: Remember, working scope is indicated by the last item in the breadcrumb trail at the top of the <token>transform</token> Designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Remember, working scope is indicated by the last item in the breadcrumb trail at the top of the <token>transform</token> Designer surface.

trans-unit.source: To set scope, refer to <link xlink:href="4a57af82-cae8-412d-a066-fb6a766d0be1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working within the Scope</link>.
trans-unit.target: To set scope, refer to <link xlink:href="4a57af82-cae8-412d-a066-fb6a766d0be1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working within the Scope</link>.

trans-unit.source: Creating Links
trans-unit.target: Creating Links

trans-unit.source: Creating a link from a source to a target is left to right.
trans-unit.target: Creating a link from a source to a target is left to right.

trans-unit.source: Any link made from right to left considers left as the source and right as the target.
trans-unit.target: Any link made from right to left considers left as the source and right as the target.

trans-unit.source: Any link made from left to right considers left as the source and right as the target.
trans-unit.target: Any link made from left to right considers left as the source and right as the target.

trans-unit.source: Direct Links
trans-unit.target: Direct Links

trans-unit.source: To link source and target nodes with similar node structure or node names, use the <legacyBold>Direct Link</legacyBold> feature.
trans-unit.target: To link source and target nodes with similar node structure or node names, use the <legacyBold>Direct Link</legacyBold> feature.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Direct Linking</legacyBold> can be used with repeating records and non-repeating records.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Direct Linking</legacyBold> can be used with repeating records and non-repeating records.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="42b6bb45-6c49-466a-aed6-88811f0e40a1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Loop Operations</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="42b6bb45-6c49-466a-aed6-88811f0e40a1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Loop Operations</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Test the Transform
trans-unit.target: Test the Transform

trans-unit.source: Use the <embeddedLabel>Test Map Input File</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Test Map Output File</embeddedLabel> properties of the <token>transform</token> in <token>vs_current_short</token>:
trans-unit.target: Use the <embeddedLabel>Test Map Input File</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Test Map Output File</embeddedLabel> properties of the <token>transform</token> in <token>vs_current_short</token>:

trans-unit.source: Select the <token>transform</token> (.trfm) file in Solution Explorer.
trans-unit.target: Select the <token>transform</token> (.trfm) file in Solution Explorer.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, click <embeddedLabel>Test Map Input File</embeddedLabel> and browse to the sample input.xml.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, click <embeddedLabel>Test Map Input File</embeddedLabel> and browse to the sample input.xml.

trans-unit.source: Click <legacyBold>Open</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Click <legacyBold>Open</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, click <embeddedLabel>Test Map Output File</embeddedLabel> and browse to the sample output.xml.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, click <embeddedLabel>Test Map Output File</embeddedLabel> and browse to the sample output.xml.

trans-unit.source: Click <legacyBold>Open</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Click <legacyBold>Open</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the <token>transform</token> in Solution Explorer and select <embeddedLabel>Test Map</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the <token>transform</token> in Solution Explorer and select <embeddedLabel>Test Map</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The Output window displays the result.
trans-unit.target: The Output window displays the result.

trans-unit.source: If a <token>transform</token> contains a <legacyBold>Get Context Property</legacyBold> <token>mapop</token>, a <ui>Test Data for context property</ui> window displays.
trans-unit.target: If a <token>transform</token> contains a <legacyBold>Get Context Property</legacyBold> <token>mapop</token>, a <ui>Test Data for context property</ui> window displays.

trans-unit.source: In this window, you can enter a temporary value for the context property to test the <token>transform</token>.
trans-unit.target: In this window, you can enter a temporary value for the context property to test the <token>transform</token>.

trans-unit.source: SCOPE/LOOP BEST PRACTICES
trans-unit.target: SCOPE/LOOP BEST PRACTICES

trans-unit.source: Containing Scope
trans-unit.target: Containing Scope

trans-unit.source: Every <token>mapop</token> and link has a <legacyBold>Containing Scope</legacyBold> property.
trans-unit.target: Every <token>mapop</token> and link has a <legacyBold>Containing Scope</legacyBold> property.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>Containing Scope</legacyBold> property indicates the parent scope container.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>Containing Scope</legacyBold> property indicates the parent scope container.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to help determine the current parent scope container.
trans-unit.target: Use this property to help determine the current parent scope container.

trans-unit.source: Container
trans-unit.target: Container

trans-unit.source: Each container can be minimized and expanded.
trans-unit.target: Each container can be minimized and expanded.

trans-unit.source: Setting scope on a MapEach Loop can be done when the container is expanded.
trans-unit.target: Setting scope on a MapEach Loop can be done when the container is expanded.

trans-unit.source: Modifying links are done when the container is minimized or expanded.
trans-unit.target: Modifying links are done when the container is minimized or expanded.

trans-unit.source: Minimizing the container automatically unsets the scope.
trans-unit.target: Minimizing the container automatically unsets the scope.

trans-unit.source: Minimizing the container also provides a larger design surface.
trans-unit.target: Minimizing the container also provides a larger design surface.

trans-unit.source: Ambiguous Links
trans-unit.target: Ambiguous Links

trans-unit.source: If the <token>transform</token> Designer determines that the scope of a link or a <token>mapop</token> is ambiguous when the link or <token>mapop</token> is created, an error is flagged when compiled.
trans-unit.target: If the <token>transform</token> Designer determines that the scope of a link or a <token>mapop</token> is ambiguous when the link or <token>mapop</token> is created, an error is flagged when compiled.

trans-unit.source: All errors are flagged during <token>transform</token> compilation and when loading a fresh <token>transform</token>.
trans-unit.target: All errors are flagged during <token>transform</token> compilation and when loading a fresh <token>transform</token>.

trans-unit.source: Error & Data Handling
trans-unit.target: Error & Data Handling

trans-unit.source: Error Handling and Null/Empty Data Handling behavior is configurable for the <token>transform</token> Runtime.
trans-unit.target: Error Handling and Null/Empty Data Handling behavior is configurable for the <token>transform</token> Runtime.

trans-unit.source: To customize how your application handles these scenarios, configure these settings in the individual <token>mapop</token>s in the <token>vs_current_short</token> project.
trans-unit.target: To customize how your application handles these scenarios, configure these settings in the individual <token>mapop</token>s in the <token>vs_current_short</token> project.

trans-unit.source: Home Link
trans-unit.target: Home Link

trans-unit.source: Selecting <legacyBold>Home</legacyBold> in the breadcrumb trail puts the <token>transform</token> at the Home (Page) scope.
trans-unit.target: Selecting <legacyBold>Home</legacyBold> in the breadcrumb trail puts the <token>transform</token> at the Home (Page) scope.

trans-unit.source: No scope is set and the <legacyBold>Containing Scope</legacyBold> property displays None.
trans-unit.target: No scope is set and the <legacyBold>Containing Scope</legacyBold> property displays None.

trans-unit.source: Move To Working Scope
trans-unit.target: Move To Working Scope

trans-unit.source: When moving links and <token>mapop</token>s, refer to the highlight propagation and the <legacyBold>Containing Scope</legacyBold> property to determine the parent and child scope containers.
trans-unit.target: When moving links and <token>mapop</token>s, refer to the highlight propagation and the <legacyBold>Containing Scope</legacyBold> property to determine the parent and child scope containers.

trans-unit.source: Sibling and Children
trans-unit.target: Sibling and Children

trans-unit.source: Operations in a scope can use the source elements and <token>mapop</token>s available in its scope and its parent hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Operations in a scope can use the source elements and <token>mapop</token>s available in its scope and its parent hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: Elements and <token>mapop</token>s in a sibling or child scope cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: Elements and <token>mapop</token>s in a sibling or child scope cannot be used.

trans-unit.source: Ctrl + Select
trans-unit.target: Ctrl + Select

trans-unit.source: To move <token>mapop</token>s and their links, use <legacyBold>Ctrl + Click</legacyBold> to select the items to move.
trans-unit.target: To move <token>mapop</token>s and their links, use <legacyBold>Ctrl + Click</legacyBold> to select the items to move.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Ctrl + Click</legacyBold> cuts the items and then you paste to the desired location.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Ctrl + Click</legacyBold> cuts the items and then you paste to the desired location.

trans-unit.source: Repeating Record with Direct Linking
trans-unit.target: Repeating Record with Direct Linking

trans-unit.source: Draw a link from a repeating record in the source document to the repeating record in the target document.
trans-unit.target: Draw a link from a repeating record in the source document to the repeating record in the target document.

trans-unit.source: When doing this, you can create direct links by node name and structure.
trans-unit.target: When doing this, you can create direct links by node name and structure.

trans-unit.source: For other options, go to <link xlink:href="42b6bb45-6c49-466a-aed6-88811f0e40a1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Loop Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For other options, go to <link xlink:href="42b6bb45-6c49-466a-aed6-88811f0e40a1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Loop Operations</link>.

trans-unit.target: More Transforms topics
